errors-present-in-document.detail: The rel member **MUST** be a string indicating the link’s relation type.
The title member **MUST** be a string which serves as a label for the destination of a link such that it can be used as a human-readable identifier (e.g., a menu entry).
The type member **MUST** be a string indicating the media type of the link’s target.
The hreflang member **MUST** be a string or an array of strings indicating the language(s) of the link’s target.
A link **MUST** be represented as either: a string containing the link's URL or a link object.
The describedby member **MUST** be a string.
A link object **MUST** contain a href member.
